--Query--
SELECT arraySort(h3kRing(581276613233082367, toUInt16(1)))
--Result--
[([581250224954015743, 581259021047037951, 581267817140060159, 581276613233082367, 581500913605148671, 581518505791193087, 581764796395814911],)]
+--------------------+
--Query--
SELECT h3kRing(581276613233082367, toUInt16(0))
--Result--
[([581276613233082367],)]
+--------------------+
